name: y
description: * web application server   * express-js - provides routing and functionality through middleware * 2FA   * otplib -  a nodejs implementation of HOTP (HMAC-Based One-Time Password) and TOTP (Time-Based One-time Password) algorithms. * UI   * react - js component based UI framework that utilizes parent-child relationships to pass UI state changes down from parent to child which initiates asynchronous DOM updates to a virtual dom * UX   * react material design - UI component library that provides structure (html), styling (css) and behavior (js)
